name: True Skin Serum Concealer with Vitamin C
about: What it is:A creamy, ultra-lightweight serum concealer that evens and brightens the look of skin over time with vitamin C—now available in a range of shades..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Stabilized Vitamin C: Visibly brightens, evens out skin tone, and reduces fine lines and wrinkles..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Color-correct and perfect with a creaseless formula that never cakes. This medium-coverage concealer blends seamlessly under eyes and over spots—helping to smooth, brighten, and diminish the look of dark circles and blemishes. Enriched with stabilized vitamin C, the lightweight formula helps refine, nourish, and protect skin from environmental damage while you wear it.
ingredients: -Stabilized Vitamin C: Visibly brightens, evens out skin tone, and reduces fine lines and wrinkles.  .-Mastic: Visibly refines skin throughout the day. .-Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract: Promotes smooth-, supple-looking skin with antioxidant benefits...Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tetradecane, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Glycerin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Decyl Isostearate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Isostearic Acid, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Propanediol, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Gluconolactone, Lauroyl Lysine, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Zinc Stearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hexadecane, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Calcium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Darutoside, Phenethyl Alcohol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (±): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep your skin with three to four drops of True Skin Radiant Priming Serum (sold separately). -Let it dry down to a soft-to-the-touch finish. .-Apply three dots of concealer below the eye and around any areas where you would like to even out skin tone. .-Begin blending with our True Skin Complexion Brush (sold separately). .-Finish by taking your ring finger and pressing product into the skin. .-Set with the Soft Focus Finishing Powder (sold separately).

shades.shade_descriptor: Very deep with neutral cool underton

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Arrowroot SC0.5 - Very light with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product because of the vitamin c but it did not work for me. It was very patchy under my eyes.

Love this concealer so much but the packaging is awful. I swear half of it is wasted due to how bad it leaks. I store it up right and it still leaks out the cap. But it’s a great product, doesn’t break me out & blends so nice!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Suma SC1.5 - Light with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product doesn’t blend well. I’m in my 30s and it emphasizes the fine lines. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using the True Skin Serum Concealer w/Vitamin C, I love the results. It provides the perfect coverage for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is patchy, doesn’t blend well, and breaks me out. It even caused some burns under my eyes.  But I love that it is clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SOOOO PATCHY. It picks up any makeup underneath and looks so awful, i wanted to love it so badly. Tower 28 is better
